title: Implementation of Towns East of Colombo District Water Supply Project - Package III with Funding Secured from Local Banks
decision_details: - Cabinet approval has already been granted for the implementation of the above project pertaining to Homagama, Padukka and Seethawaka Divisional Secretariat Areas. The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, for the National Water Supply and Drainage Board to enter into a loan agreement for the purpose with the relevant domestic bank, was approved by the Cabinet.
